name: Pickle West
description:
Top down bullet hell rogue like done for the SGJ2022

The intended way to play this game is via the Desktop version, the audio effects on the WebGL version aren't working.

  • WASD to move (Left stick), 
  • Arrow keys to shoot (Right stick), 
  • Space to switch between melee and ranged combat (RT).
  • Space to begin the game

You'll have to juggle between melee and ranged combat, as staying too long in either mode will end up with you taking damage

Done by :

  • Dominic Brousseau (Tourmi)
  • Patrick Bergeron (Lunix33)
  • Jasmin Martin (MCToupin) 
  •  Handel Lavoie-Roy (Sapheu2)
